response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for $125. It's an excellent chance to experience the best we have to offer at a slightly elevated price point. If you're interested, let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 125}
